page.title: 08A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: A Day in My Life -Kay Mathieson 7.30 Get up,have breakfast-cornflakes,coffee toast and butter 8.00 travel from North Connel to Dalmally (20miles) 8.30 arrive Dalmally Primary School to begin work 9.00 school day begins,first topic of work mathematics followed by language work. 10.30 interval children go out to play teachers have cup of coffee. 10.45 back to classroom theme work until lunch time 12.15 lunch school dinners served for those too far from home to walk 13.15 theme work 14.45 interval 15.30 end of school for the day 16.00 travel home to North Connel evening Scottish country dancing -Oban
